Generated Narrative: ValueSet r2bo-morfologicosct-cieo-VS

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version 📍 where constraint = <108369006,^446608001
  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/icd-o-3 version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept descends from M (Morfología)

name: MorfologicoSnomedCIEOVS
title: Set de Valores Morfología
description: Set de valores utilizados para morfologías, estos pueden ser mapeados de Snomed CT a la CIE-O 3 Morfológico o ser usado directamente en CIE-O 3 Morfológico
